019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu;
020
021import java.io.IOException;
022import java.math.BigInteger;
023import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
024import java.nio.file.Files;
025import java.nio.file.Path;
026import java.nio.file.attribute.PosixFilePermission;
027import java.util.Set;
028import java.util.UUID;
029import java.util.logging.Level;
030import java.util.logging.Logger;
031import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.APP_NAME;
032import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Convertions;
033import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.Dto;
034import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.FsdUtils;
035
036/**
037 * The configuration information from the configuration file.
038 */
039@SuppressWarnings("PMD.ExcessivePublicCount")
040public class Configuration implements Dto {
041    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.FieldNamingConventions")
042    protected final Logger logger = Logger.getLogger(getClass().getName());
043
044    /** The data dir. */
045    public Path dataDir;
046
047    /** The runtime dir. */
048    public Path runtimeDir;
049
050    /** The template. */
051    public String template;
052
053    /** The update template. */
054    public boolean updateTemplate;
055
056    /** The swtpm socket. */
057    public Path swtpmSocket;
058
059    /** The monitor socket. */
060    public Path monitorSocket;
061
062    /** The firmware rom. */
063    public Path firmwareRom;
064
065    /** The firmware vars. */
066    public Path firmwareVars;
067
068    /** The vm. */
069    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ShortVariable")
070    public Vm vm;
071
072    /**
073     * Subsection "vm".
074     */
075    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.ShortClassName", "PMD.TooManyFields",
076        "PMD.DataClass" })
077    public static class Vm implements Dto {
078
079        /** The name. */
080        public String name;
081
082        /** The uuid. */
083        public String uuid;
084
085        /** The use tpm. */
086        public boolean useTpm;
087
088        /** The boot menu. */
089        public boolean bootMenu;
090
091        /** The firmware. */
092        public String firmware = "uefi";
093
094        /** The maximum ram. */
095        public BigInteger maximumRam;
096
097        /** The current ram. */
098        public BigInteger currentRam;
099
100        /** The cpu model. */
101        public String cpuModel = "host";
102
103        /** The maximum cpus. */
104        public int maximumCpus = 1;
105
106        /** The current cpus. */
107        public int currentCpus = 1;
108
109        /** The cpu sockets. */
110        public int sockets;
111
112        /** The dies per socket. */
113        public int diesPerSocket;
114
115        /** The cores per die. */
116        public int coresPerDie;
117
118        /** The threads per core. */
119        public int threadsPerCore;
120
121        /** The accelerator. */
122        public String accelerator = "kvm";
123
124        /** The rtc base. */
125        public String rtcBase = "utc";
126
127        /** The rtc clock. */
128        public String rtcClock = "rt";
129
130        /** The powerdown timeout. */
131        public int powerdownTimeout = 900;
132
133        /** The network. */
134        public Network[] network = { new Network() };
135
136        /** The drives. */
137        public Drive[] drives = new Drive[0];
138
139        /** The display. */
140        public Display display;
141
142        /**
143         * Convert value from JSON parser.
144         *
145         * @param value the new maximum ram
146         */
147        public void setMaximumRam(String value) {
148            maximumRam = Convertions.parseMemory(value);
149        }
150
151        /**
152         * Convert value from JSON parser.
153         *
154         * @param value the new current ram
155         */
156        public void setCurrentRam(String value) {
157            currentRam = Convertions.parseMemory(value);
158        }
159    }
160
161    /**
162     * Subsection "network".
163     */
164    public static class Network implements Dto {
165
166        /** The type. */
167        public String type = "tap";
168
169        /** The bridge. */
170        public String bridge;
171
172        /** The device. */
173        public String device = "virtio-net";
174
175        /** The mac. */
176        public String mac;
177
178        /** The net. */
179        public String net;
180    }
181
182    /**
183     * Subsection "drive".
184     */
185    public static class Drive implements Dto {
186
187        /** The type. */
188        public String type;
189
190        /** The bootindex. */
191        public Integer bootindex;
192
193        /** The device. */
194        public String device;
195
196        /** The file. */
197        public String file;
198
199        /** The resource. */
200        public String resource;
201    }
202
203    /**
204     * The Class Display.
205     */
206    public static class Display implements Dto {
207        public Spice spice;
208    }
209
210    /**
211     * Subsection "spice".
212     */
213    public static class Spice implements Dto {
214
215        /** The port. */
216        public int port = 5900;
217
218        /** The ticket. */
219        public String ticket;
220
221        /** The streaming video. */
222        public String streamingVideo;
223
224        /** The usb redirects. */
225        public int usbRedirects = 2;
226    }
227
228    /**
229     * Check configuration.
230     *
231     * @return true, if successful
232     */
233    public boolean check() {
234        if (vm == null || vm.name == null) {
235            logger.severe(() -> "Configuration is missing mandatory entries.");
236            return false;
237        }
238        if (!checkRuntimeDir() || !checkDataDir() || !checkUuid()) {
239            return false;
240        }
241
242        // Adjust max cpus if necessary
243        if (vm.currentCpus > vm.maximumCpus) {
244            vm.maximumCpus = vm.currentCpus;
245        }
246
247        checkDrives();
248
249        return true;
250    }
251
252    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidLiteralsInIfCondition")
253    private void checkDrives() {
254        for (Drive drive : vm.drives) {
255            if (drive.file != null || drive.device != null
256                || "ide-cd".equals(drive.type)) {
257                continue;
258            }
259            if (drive.resource == null) {
260                logger.severe(
261                    () -> "Drive configuration is missing its resource.");
262
263            }
264            if (Files.isRegularFile(Path.of(drive.resource))) {
265                drive.file = drive.resource;
266            } else {
267                drive.device = drive.resource;
268            }
269        }
270    }
271
272    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidDeeplyNestedIfStmts")
273    private boolean checkRuntimeDir() {
274        // Runtime directory (sockets etc.)
275        if (runtimeDir == null) {
276            var appDir = FsdUtils.runtimeDir(APP_NAME.replace("-", ""));
277            if (!Files.exists(appDir) && appDir.toFile().mkdirs()) {
278                try {
279                    // When appDir is derived from XDG_RUNTIME_DIR
280                    // the latter should already have these permissions,
281                    // but let's be on the safe side.
282                    Files.setPosixFilePermissions(appDir,
283                        Set.of(PosixFilePermission.OWNER_READ,
284                            PosixFilePermission.OWNER_WRITE,
285                            PosixFilePermission.OWNER_EXECUTE));
286                } catch (IOException e) {
287                    logger.warning(() -> String.format(
288                        "Cannot set permissions rwx------ on \"%s\".",
289                        runtimeDir));
290                }
291            }
292            runtimeDir = FsdUtils.runtimeDir(APP_NAME.replace("-", ""))
293                .resolve(vm.name);
294            runtimeDir.toFile().mkdir();
295            swtpmSocket = runtimeDir.resolve("swtpm-sock");
296            monitorSocket = runtimeDir.resolve("monitor.sock");
297        }
298        if (!Files.isDirectory(runtimeDir) || !Files.isWritable(runtimeDir)) {
299            logger.severe(() -> String.format(
300                "Configured runtime directory \"%s\""
301                    + " does not exist or isn't writable.",
302                runtimeDir));
303            return false;
304        }
305        return true;
306    }
307
308    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidDeeplyNestedIfStmts")
309    private boolean checkDataDir() {
310        // Data directory
311        if (dataDir == null) {
312            dataDir
313                = FsdUtils.dataHome(APP_NAME.replace("-", "")).resolve(vm.name);
314        }
315        if (!Files.exists(dataDir)) {
316            dataDir.toFile().mkdirs();
317        }
318        if (!Files.isDirectory(dataDir) || !Files.isWritable(dataDir)) {
319            logger.severe(() -> String.format(
320                "Configured data directory \"%s\""
321                    + " does not exist or isn't writable.",
322                dataDir));
323            return false;
324        }
325        return true;
326    }
327
328    private boolean checkUuid() {
329        // Explicitly configured uuid takes precedence.
330        if (vm.uuid != null) {
331            return true;
332        }
333
334        // Try to read stored uuid.
335        Path uuidPath = dataDir.resolve("uuid.txt");
336        if (Files.isReadable(uuidPath)) {
337            try {
338                var stored
339                    = Files.lines(uuidPath, StandardCharsets.UTF_8).findFirst();
340                if (stored.isPresent()) {
341                    vm.uuid = stored.get();
342                    return true;
343                }
344            } catch (IOException e) {
345                logger.log(Level.WARNING, e,
346                    () -> "Stored uuid cannot be read: " + e.getMessage());
347            }
348        }
349
350        // Generate new uuid
351        vm.uuid = UUID.randomUUID().toString();
352        try {
353            Files.writeString(uuidPath, vm.uuid + "\n");
354        } catch (IOException e) {
355            logger.log(Level.WARNING, e,
356                () -> "Cannot store uuid: " + e.getMessage());
357        }
358
359        return true;
360    }
361}
